TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Burundi, title = Burundi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Burundi} }

S.FORM: Burundi hya' ga cyux maki' tay 3 30 S, 30 00 E na Xweco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 27,830 sq km (maki' tay 147ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 25,680 sq km, kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 2,150 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 11,099,298. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 73.30%, lhlahuy hya' ga 6.60%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 20.10%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Bujumbura. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay mpitu' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Pierre Nkurunziza, aring ryax 26 squ byacing tay 4 sa kawas 2005 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. zyaw na kinbkesan lalu nya sraran ga (Urundi), mpuw tyu' na seki ini pkkang. mpuw qeru seki taring, Inko, Tko, Piris cyugang koka. 1890 kawas wal galan Tko maki qalang nha bsyaq balay kengri, kaki qalang na TsutongFe na rhyal, ru 1916 kawas myt Piris hetay wal nha htuy. te qutux pintriqan na cinbwanaa, koleng ga kaki aqonan nya Lua'ta ru Ulongti sqasuw nha, biqan nya Piris, Piris ga anay ta Kabul binah kragay ta each qalang qasa. ru tehoq te sazing pintriqan na cinbwanan tmasoq la, ru q'ta ru Ulongti lenghko mlahang qalang qasa, riyil mlahang Piris. 1959 kawas ga talah la Ulongti ru Luang ta, 1962 kawas mitu byacing qutux ryax suruw nanah, cyux msqun Pulongtiwanko . nisan surux Pulongti r'tung balay keri nya. nanu ga 1996 kawas lga, raran ga mhetay mrhuw mise'. Mikongpelo qani. tarin mgluw hetay toki ga Pulongti konghko, Pulongti maki sazing spyang qalang nya, smka na squilq ga Tusi na squilq, aring mouw typ' sci ga. hga kengri kwara qalang qani. Hutu na squilq ga qutux kumi nha ru twangan cikay Tayal Twa . yal atan cipoq na squilq qalang ta ini ta nya Psiinlungan, maki 1993 kawas mpuw byacing na toki, nisan tama pasat byacing mrhuw ga, hiya ga te qutux Hutu na squilq mrhuw, ru sengkyo sotow Me'siaw n'tataye wal kutan Tusi na squilq. sazing qalang qani ga mciriq pusan mang wal mhuqin squilq ma, ru tehok 2002 kawas lga setu na Tusi kmal muci laxi ta pciriq la, pkayal muci 民族解放力量 (法語: Conseil National Pour la Défense de la Démocratie–Forces pour la Défense de la Démocratie, CNDD–FDD) na cyux blaq mkayal la, 2006 kawas Peru byacing mitu ryax lga, keng yaq 三蘭港 ru sangniya na qalang la. 地理 Pulongti ga tuqux koka uzi, cyux maki beh Tobe tareku na babaw, zihung balay rhyal nya, wagiq ru unta bnux rgyaxnya, maki sazing na liyung qutux ga Nilog , qutux ga Kang koh , Lalu nua ga "Fecocqing" kwara koka ga hitocbo 27830平方kongri. 位置 Pulong ti qalang qani ga maki tong Fectaw , qutux neru koka, cyugan kak kano nya 東接 Tasanniya , 西鄰 Kangkomincu konghko, 北 ru rua'ta, 分水嶺 nya ga kangkoh ru niloh. 地形 Koka na Pulongti qani ga haypa 1500 米 na kawyen, Sipu' ru rua'ta ga qes, wagiq balay rgyax nya, wagiq balay ga tehoq 2760 米, tehoq tansanniya lga 1300 meta in wagiq nya, sipu' kura' tansanniya lga byaq tehoq tong Fe tarekusic . 水系 Luciciru Tankanikhu maki TonFereku qasa, tankanikhu ga hopa balay na bsilung, smka ga maki beh Pulongti, ru maki qutux Ci Fuhu . kayal mkilux balay kayal nya. qutux kawas ga qsya nya ga tehoq 1200-1600 hakmi . ana maki ctaw ga beha hmswa ga mqwalah krryax. cingay balay qsya nya, hogung nya tuqiy, ana koba ru eki. heci wal horun hopa qsya, luhiy tuqiy ru hongu. 行政區劃 Pulongti qalang ga maki mpuw pitu pgleng linhoyan nya, 2002 kawas ga, pusongpusong sazing peleng linhoyan nya, qutux ga pusong pusong 市 ra pusong pusong 鄉. 布班扎省 Bubanza 布松布拉城市省 Bujumbura Mairie 布松布拉鄉村省 Bujumbura Rural 布魯里省 Bururi 坎庫佐省 Cankuzo 錫比托凱省 Cibitoke 基特加省 Gitega 卡魯濟省 Karuzi 卡揚扎省 Kayanza 基龍多省 Kirundo 馬坎巴省 Makamba 穆拉姆維亞省 Muramvya 穆因加省 Muyinga 穆瓦洛省 Mwaro 恩戈齊省 Ngozi 魯塔納省 Rutana 魯伊吉省 Ruyigi ggalan pila kefe ru Ocya ga Pulongti spyang ggalan na pila, qutux qutux kawas ga mita kayak blaq ga ru yaqeh kanaal, ru qlangan na squilq lga, ungat than nha uzi la. Pulongti qalang qani ga spijl balay na pbahuw ga: guqoh, qetung, kawlyang, spyal cingay ga guqoh. pqmqhun/pqumah Pulongti koka mani ga pqumah spijl ggalan nha, ana ga ini qbaq mqumah ru czyaw zyaw na qmayeh, spyal na pbahuw ga mak i: kafe, menhwa, susu, qerang, ngahi, luri, guqoh, kawlyang, bonaw, marinsuru, layang;kwening, saping, nuka na abura, tbaku, pagay ru saping abura , spyal balay na pinbahu' ga musa qerang ru ngahi, menhwa, yuye. 畜牧業 kinbahan na zyaw ga zyuwaw na pnqnyatan, qnayat nha ga qluyah qehuy na kacing, mít ru manyang. zyuwaw na quilh sezon qmayat qulih maki ben Tankanik 湖, 2005 kawas nagan nha quilh ga 14200 kontung . 礦業 Pulongti koka mani ga ungat kuangcan nha, wayal raran ga maki cikay si , u ru king, aring sarren ru tehoq misuw ga ini kinky kuangcan qani na. zyuwaw na rengki zyuwaw na rengki ga nisan taring na, kafe ru menhua nanak cyogun nha na, ru bỉu, naqiy kbalay, 2007 kawas rentki nya ga 9200 萬度 . ttuqi ini blaq ttuqi nha, ungat kisya nha uzi, qluyuh na tai ga 12322 congri, 1286 congri tuqi na amutu, te sazing lga cynglu 3700 congri, thay lga tuqi rgyax la. ini hga blaq kmalay, yaqeh balay kngyan. basu nha ga 4800 輛 nanak basu ga kura tansanniya, pusongpula, puson pusola skoki, maki musa beh Oco, kangko mincukonghko ru Tongfe. koci petugan qeqaya' osa qalang binah maki tbiran peyugan qeqaya' ga, 2009 kawas kwara toto ga 6800 mang pila na Amirika, spyang tbagiy na qaya' ga kafe, ocya, sato, menhwa ru hnkuy獸波, spyang tbiran na koka ga Zes, Inko, Pacistan, Piris, Ruanta ru Ici. kahul qalang binah Pulangti koka maki 2009 kawas kwara thana nya ga 2.75 ik Amirika na pila, spyal mwah koka na qeqaya ga kikay, abura, nniqun. spyal na koka ga sautialapo, Piris, Ukanta, Kngya, Cyukok, Fako, Intu, Tansanniya ru Zipung. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Borondi hya' ga cyox maki' tay 3 30 S, 30 00 E na Xweco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 27,830 sq km (maki' tay 147ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 25,680 sq km, kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 2,150 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 11,099,298. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 73.30%, lhlahoy hya' ga 6.60%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 20.10%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Bojombora. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay mpito' byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Pierre Nkoronziza, aring ryax 26 sqo byacing tay 4 sa kawas 2005 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. zyaw na kinbkesan lalo nya sraran ga (Urondi), mpow tyo' na seki ini pkkang. mpow qero seki taring, Inko, Tko, Piris cyogang koka. 1890 kawas wal galan Tko maki qalang nha bsyaq balay kengri, kaki qalang na TsotongFe na rhyal, ro 1916 kawas myt Piris hetay wal nha htoy. te qotox pintriqan na cinbwanaa, koleng ga kaki aqonan nya Loa'ta ro Ulongti sqasow nha, biqan nya Piris, Piris ga anay ta Kabol binah kragay ta each qalang qasa. ro tehoq te sazing pintriqan na cinbwanan tmasoq la, ro q'ta ro Ulongti lenghko mlahang qalang qasa, riyil mlahang Piris. 1959 kawas ga talah la Ulongti ro Loang ta, 1962 kawas mito byacing qotox ryax sorow nanah, cyox msqon Polongtiwanko . nisan sorox Polongti r'tong balay keri nya. nano ga 1996 kawas lga, raran ga mhetay mrhow mise'. Mikongpelo qani. tarin mglow hetay toki ga Polongti konghko, Polongti maki sazing spyang qalang nya, smka na sqoilq ga Tosi na sqoilq, aring moow typ' sci ga. hga kengri kwara qalang qani. Hoto na sqoilq ga qotox komi nha ro twangan cikay Tayal Twa . yal atan cipoq na sqoilq qalang ta ini ta nya Psiinlongan, maki 1993 kawas mpow byacing na toki, nisan tama pasat byacing mrhow ga, hiya ga te qotox Hoto na sqoilq mrhow, ro sengkyo sotow Me'siaw n'tataye wal kotan Tosi na sqoilq. sazing qalang qani ga mciriq posan mang wal mhoqin sqoilq ma, ro tehok 2002 kawas lga seto na Tosi kmal moci laxi ta pciriq la, pkayal moci 民族解放力量 (法語: Conseil National Poor la Défense de la Démocratie–Forces poor la Défense de la Démocratie, CNDD–FDD) na cyox blaq mkayal la, 2006 kawas Pero byacing mito ryax lga, keng yaq 三蘭港 ro sangniya na qalang la. 地理 Polongti ga toqox koka ozi, cyox maki beh Tobe tareko na babaw, zihong balay rhyal nya, wagiq ro onta bnox rgyaxnya, maki sazing na liyong qotox ga Nilog , qotox ga Kang koh , Lalo noa ga "Fecocqing" kwara koka ga hitocbo 27830平方kongri. 位置 Polong ti qalang qani ga maki tong Fectaw , qotox nero koka, cyogan kak kano nya 東接 Tasanniya , 西鄰 Kangkominco konghko, 北 ro roa'ta, 分水嶺 nya ga kangkoh ro niloh. 地形 Koka na Polongti qani ga haypa 1500 米 na kawyen, Sipo' ro roa'ta ga qes, wagiq balay rgyax nya, wagiq balay ga tehoq 2760 米, tehoq tansanniya lga 1300 meta in wagiq nya, sipo' kora' tansanniya lga byaq tehoq tong Fe tarekosic . 水系 Lociciro Tankanikho maki TonFereko qasa, tankanikho ga hopa balay na bsilong, smka ga maki beh Polongti, ro maki qotox Ci Foho . kayal mkilox balay kayal nya. qotox kawas ga qsya nya ga tehoq 1200-1600 hakmi . ana maki ctaw ga beha hmswa ga mqwalah krryax. cingay balay qsya nya, hogong nya toqiy, ana koba ro eki. heci wal horon hopa qsya, lohiy toqiy ro hongo. 行政區劃 Polongti qalang ga maki mpow pito pgleng linhoyan nya, 2002 kawas ga, posongposong sazing peleng linhoyan nya, qotox ga posong posong 市 ra posong posong 鄉. 布班扎省 Bobanza 布松布拉城市省 Bojombora Mairie 布松布拉鄉村省 Bojombora Roral 布魯里省 Borori 坎庫佐省 Cankozo 錫比托凱省 Cibitoke 基特加省 Gitega 卡魯濟省 Karozi 卡揚扎省 Kayanza 基龍多省 Kirondo 馬坎巴省 Makamba 穆拉姆維亞省 Moramvya 穆因加省 Moyinga 穆瓦洛省 Mwaro 恩戈齊省 Ngozi 魯塔納省 Rotana 魯伊吉省 Royigi ggalan pila kefe ro Ocya ga Polongti spyang ggalan na pila, qotox qotox kawas ga mita kayak blaq ga ro yaqeh kanaal, ro qlangan na sqoilq lga, ongat than nha ozi la. Polongti qalang qani ga spijl balay na pbahow ga: goqoh, qetong, kawlyang, spyal cingay ga goqoh. pqmqhon/pqomah Polongti koka mani ga pqomah spijl ggalan nha, ana ga ini qbaq mqomah ro czyaw zyaw na qmayeh, spyal na pbahow ga mak i: kafe, menhwa, soso, qerang, ngahi, lori, goqoh, kawlyang, bonaw, marinsoro, layang;kwening, saping, noka na abora, tbako, pagay ro saping abora , spyal balay na pinbaho' ga mosa qerang ro ngahi, menhwa, yoye. 畜牧業 kinbahan na zyaw ga zyowaw na pnqnyatan, qnayat nha ga qloyah qehoy na kacing, mít ro manyang. zyowaw na qoilh sezon qmayat qolih maki ben Tankanik 湖, 2005 kawas nagan nha qoilh ga 14200 kontong . 礦業 Polongti koka mani ga ongat koangcan nha, wayal raran ga maki cikay si , o ro king, aring sarren ro tehoq misow ga ini kinky koangcan qani na. zyowaw na rengki zyowaw na rengki ga nisan taring na, kafe ro menhoa nanak cyogon nha na, ro bỉo, naqiy kbalay, 2007 kawas rentki nya ga 9200 萬度 . ttoqi ini blaq ttoqi nha, ongat kisya nha ozi, qloyoh na tai ga 12322 congri, 1286 congri toqi na amoto, te sazing lga cynglo 3700 congri, thay lga toqi rgyax la. ini hga blaq kmalay, yaqeh balay kngyan. baso nha ga 4800 輛 nanak baso ga kora tansanniya, posongpola, poson posola skoki, maki mosa beh Oco, kangko mincokonghko ro Tongfe. koci petogan qeqaya' osa qalang binah maki tbiran peyogan qeqaya' ga, 2009 kawas kwara toto ga 6800 mang pila na Amirika, spyang tbagiy na qaya' ga kafe, ocya, sato, menhwa ro hnkoy獸波, spyang tbiran na koka ga Zes, Inko, Pacistan, Piris, Roanta ro Ici. kahol qalang binah Polangti koka maki 2009 kawas kwara thana nya ga 2.75 ik Amirika na pila, spyal mwah koka na qeqaya ga kikay, abora, nniqon. spyal na koka ga saotialapo, Piris, Ukanta, Kngya, Cyokok, Fako, Into, Tansanniya ro Zipong. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
